meaningMnemonic: Under this <radical>roof</radical> someone <radical>odd</radical> is trying to <kanji>draw near</kanji> to you. You back up, but they continue to draw near anyway.
readingMnemonic: They continue to <kanji>draw near</kanji> until you can't take it anymore. You run out from under the roof, slam the door closed, and lock it with a <reading>key</reading> (き).
